title: South Korea wildfires: 4 dead, hundreds displaced as govt declares emergency
byline: South Korea has declared a state of disaster after multiple forest fires hit the countryâ€™s south, killing at least four and displacing hundreds of residents from their homes.

title: Treat for faithful as Pope released from hospital
byline: Pope Francis will be released from the hospital and give a blessing to the faithful on Sunday, after 38 days of battling a life-threatening case of pneumonia.
